Dear RIOT, 

I am an Indian Gamer, playing League of Legends in Bangalore, India. 
I first saw it during season one, on a mmo website, and then installed it in a popular Gaming cafe, Zapak Gameplex., with another friend, and it slowly gained fame here.
I first played Gangplank, and immediately loved the Champ. I saw others playing him as a tank, but never did I try that out. 

I simply played him, making a build worthy of any ADC, and have continued doing so, four seasons later. 
This patch, has absolutely crushed me, due to the NERF, (not buff) of his ult, and damage ratios. 
Please check Match History, of the user lohith0205, (my username) to see the differences yourself. 
The waves are the same slow speed, and the damage doesnt really do anything late game. Building AP in a match where there are usually Mag. Res. Champs is suicide. Hence it is currently unplayable. 

I hope the staff checks this out, because I would love to play my favorite Champion, and ride the wins to atleast Gold, in season five. 

Thank you,
lohith0205
